mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_‪item_soldout ( member_item_no, member_unique_no, soldout_date ) VALUES ( #{memberItemNo}, #{memberUniqueNo}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT iso.soldout_no AS soldoutNo, iso.member_item_no AS memberItemNo, iso.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, iso.soldout_date AS soldoutDate, i.member_item_title AS memberItemTitle, i.member_item_price AS memberItemPrice, i.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNoSale, i.member_item_date AS memberItemDate, ip.member_item_pic1 AS memberItemPic1 FROM mini_market_‪item_soldout AS iso INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item AS i ON iso.member_item_no = i.member_item_no INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item_pic AS ip ON i.member_item_no = ip.member_item_no WHERE iso.member_unique_no = #{memberUniqueNo} ORDER BY iso.soldout_no DESC
